while you are transform, the follow rule appli:

you ca n't cast spell, and your abil to speak or take ani action that requir hand is limit to the capabl of your beast form. transform doe n't break your concentr on a spell you 've alreadi cast, howev, or prevent you from take action that are part of a spell, such as call lightn, that you 've alreadi cast.
